title: Facebook's fake deepfake problem
description:
The dark origins of deepfake videos and Facebook’s new policy explained.

Featuring:
@kellymakena
@samleecole

Links to resources discussed:
Facebook’s deepfake ban isn’t winning over critics
https://www.theverge.com/2020/1/7/21055283/facebook-deepfake-ban-political-ads-shallowfakes-rules-moderation

Deepfakes Were Created As a Way to Own Women's Bodies—We Can't Forget That

Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
